citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:28pm on
06/24/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling the licensee and leaving a voice message, waiting
30 minutes, and calling the licensee again. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is
a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:28pm on 
06/24/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling the licensee and leaving a voice message, waiting 
30 minutes, and calling the licensee again. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is 
a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
